Citizens Bank Park (Philadelphia, Pa)
World Series
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: As the Eagles’ beating of the Giants wound down at Lincoln Financial Field, fans streamed out toward nearby Citizens Bank Park, the site of the Yankees-Phillies game.
snippet: As the Eagles’ beating of the Giants wound down at Lincoln Financial Field, fans streamed out toward nearby Citizens Bank Park, the site of the Yankees-Phillies game.
